mods.abstract: A RUNAWAY IN JAIL. WAS committed into the Jail of the Parish of St. Landry, on the 24th February last, 1855, a mulatto-man, calling himself ALFRED aged about 20 years, 5 feet. 5 inches high ; he speaks french and english. Alfred says he belongs to Mr. Pierre CÃ©sar Richard, residing on Bayou Courtableau, in this Parish. The owner is requested to come forward; prove property, pay charges and take him away, otherwise he will be disposed of, according to law. LOUIS L. BOUTTE, Jailor. Opelousas, March 3d, 1855.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
